alert.note: Alert for Wabasha (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 11:06AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wabasha and northwestern Buffalo Counties through 1145 AM CDT... At 1105 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pepin, or 8 miles northwest of Wabasha, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wabasha around 1125 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Nelson, Maxville, Dumfries, Highways 37 And 35, Tell, Maple Springs, Misha Mokwa, Urne, County Roads F And K K and County Roads 33 And 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
